item.title: [sld] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Primal Vigor
item.description:
Enchantment

If one or more tokens would be created, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.

item.title: [sld] Impact Tremors
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [sld] Whir of Invention
item.description:
Instant

Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Hero's Downfall
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [sld] Unbreakable Formation
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Mother of Runes
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

{T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.description:

item.title: [sld] Meteor Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

item.title: [sld] Bloom Tender
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.

item.title: [sld] Archaeomancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [sld] Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Trample

Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.title: [sld] Mesa Enchantress
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Urabrask the Hidden
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Creatures you control have haste.

Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [sld] Sheoldred, Whispering One
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [sld] Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Flash

At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards.

Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.

item.title: [sld] Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Praetor

Vigilance

Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

item.title: [sld] Spell Queller
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flash

Flying

When Spell Queller enters the battlefield, exile target spell with mana value 4 or less.

When Spell Queller leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [sld] Metallic Mimic
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Shapeshifter

As Metallic Mimic enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Metallic Mimic is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Each other creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [sld] Sakura-Tribe Elder
item.description:
Creature — Snake Shaman

Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Dryad of the Ilysian Grove
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Nymph Dryad

You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.

https://corocoro.jp/90754/

item.title: [sld] Soul-Scar Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Prowess

If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to a creature an opponent controls, put that many -1/-1 counters on that creature instead.

item.title: [sld] Howling Mine
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

item.title: [sld] Wasteland
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

item.title: [sld] Birds of Paradise
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [sld] Counterspell
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

item.title: [sld] Brainstorm
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [sld] Balance
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

item.title: [afr] Tasha's Hideous Laughter
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until that player has exiled cards with total mana value 20 or more.

item.title: [afr] Flumph
item.description:
Creature — Jellyfish

Defender, flying

Whenever Flumph is dealt damage, you and target opponent each draw a card.

item.title: [mh2] Lightning Spear
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has trample.

{2}{R}, Sacrifice Lightning Spear: It deals 3 damage to any target.

Equip {1}

item.title: [mh2] Mine Collapse
item.description:
Instant

If it's your turn, you may sacrifice a Mountain rater than pay this spell's mana cost.

Mine Collapse deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [mh2] Mount Velus Manticore
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Manticore

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. When you do, Mount Velus Manticore deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of card types the discarded card has.

item.title: [mh2] Revolutionist
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Revolutionist enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mh2] Unholy Heat
item.description:
Instant

Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [mh2] Viashino Lashclaw
item.description:
Creature — Viashino Warrior

{T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

item.title: [mh2] Bannerhide Krushok
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Reinforce 2—{1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

Scavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [mh2] Crack Open
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
